message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CY 

This paper deals with language modeling using word embeddings, which is a common topic in the natural language processing (NLP) field. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses clustering and regression, which are topics in machine learning, specifically in the areas of unsupervised learning and supervised learning, respectively. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. The paper also mentions the use of histograms, which are commonly used in information retrieval (IR) for document representation. Therefore, cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is another possible sub-category. The paper also discusses the semantic space and relatedness, which are topics in artificial intelligence (AI). Therefore, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper mentions the Common Core Standards corpus, which is related to education and curriculum, and the Wiki-SimpleWiki corpus, which is related to web content. Therefore, cs.CY (Computers and Society) is another possible sub-category.
